lines.text: [Music]
Last time on Trebuchet Village.
The gang left the town of Idiot Village to find the village idiot that lives in a cave who could save the town from its own rampant stupidity.
They ran into a merchant on the way, Larry the Planeswalker,
who liked getting roasted to the point where he wanted people to touch his penis,
which was off-putting.
His bodyguard, a pleasure man, approached Evil Stievel,
but Evil denied his involvement in what happened at Mount Honestoodle, confusing the pleasure man.
When they reached the cave, they met the wizard Why Me, aka the village idiot, a towerless wizard who whines about how
everything that happens to him is someone else's fault.
Why me, oh why me?
As they listen to Why Me's woes, and Why Me reveals to Dogen that the Dirt God doesn't
even need dirt to commune with him, the wizard told our heroes of the threat of an orc brigade
that collects taxes on the plains, and how idiot Volage will not be able to pay it.
The boys convinced Why Me to return to the town and declare himself the mayor, save it
by escorting the villagers to his cave and maybe make something of himself instead of
deflecting.
Our heroes escorted the townsfolk to the cave, only a quarter of whom vanished from being
too stupid to walk over the short journey.
Once they arrived at the cave, knowing that they were unable to pay, Thorax and his orc
group arrived to either make the village citizens into slaves or make them into food, whatever
worked.
However, Thorax took a liking to our three heroes, because of their beef with the brave
lions.
the resistance group who wishes to liberate all the terrifier kingdom from the grips of
king nardwuar and all the terrifier born.

all with the intent of pitching this idea to investors in the city.

next will be much harder.
